reviewText: I watched this series as a kid, growing up in Maryland and tried not to ever miss an episode.  I was a nut about the details in my scale modeling (tanks) and this show helped me know that there were other nerds like me out there.  A little cheesy, but what a great nostalgia trip back to the late 1980s and early 1990s.  I thought the show was a bit cheesy even back then, but now it's nothing but great memories.  I found all three volumes of this show, on VHS, on amazon.com.
